title: level 9 and still cant use free champions
body:
I think my league account is bugged because I am level 9 on the japanese server and I still can't use the free champions from free champion rotation. I am still stuck with the starter champions like ashe, garen, etc.
Not only this but I cant open hextech boxes.
After I turned 9, i got a notification saying I got a free chest! But when I go to open it, I dont have it...

Help?

replies.body: This is pretty weird. I haven't personally heard of this before, so we'll need to investigate to resolve this. If you reach out in a [support ticket,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we'll be happy to assist you further.

hi,

once i turned level 11, I was able to use my free champs again so I have solved this issue.
thanks
i submitted a ticket yesterday still no reply :/
hey targon can you help my with my problem to please
